FAQ.Question: Is this course only for advanced learners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is suitable for beginners and intermediate learners.

FAQ.Question: Can I start without prior Fiqh knowledge?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course explains rulings step by step.

FAQ.Question: Is Fiqh difficult to apply?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is taught clearly with examples, practice, and guided application.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to follow Fiqh rules confidently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Step-by-step guidance ensures correct practice and understanding.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, repeated demonstration, and clear explanation.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that teaches Islamic Fiqh (jurisprudence) to help students understand practical rulings and apply them in daily life. Focuses on acts of worship, halal & haram, purification, prayer, and Islamic ethics.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Beginners or those with basic Islamic knowledge
Learners who want to understand practical Islamic rulings
Students aiming to improve worship accuracy
Anyone seeking structured guidance in daily Islamic practice

Sections.Heading: Course Structure
Content: Introduction to Fiqh and its importance
Reflection and application in daily life

Sections.Heading: What Will You Achieve
Content: Knowledge of halal, haram, and daily ethics
Practical and disciplined approach to faith
